feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission describes and demonstrates a working financial application: it ingests a user profile, fetches live market data, produces portfolio allocations and explanations, and formats outputs for users. Evidence from Discover and Implement stages shows both intent and concrete implementation; Reflect confirms appropriate financial framing and safeguards, supporting a PASS.
- Integrate AI: The submission demonstrates substantive, functional AI integration: a GN/T model (GBT4) is fed engineered prompts plus live market data and returns structured analyses parsed into tables. Implementation details (API keys, Alpha Vantage, parsing AI JSON) and reflective discussion of limitations show more than a superficial use, satisfying the PASS criteria.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "this tool is designed to be go beyond just calculation and actually understands your financial goals"
"pull live prices for selected ETFs and assets like SPY, um, Triple Q, bonds, and gold using the Alpha Vantage API"
"as you can see, the AI responds with a full analysis. It explains why certain assets are chosen. It shows the suggested portfolio breakdown, JSON format, and highlights key risks and trade-offs."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover — defined user financial profile and goals demonstrating intended financial functionality; Implement — shows concrete integration (API keys, Alpha Vantage, live prices, pandas parsing) proving the tool executes financial tasks; Reflect — includes analysis/disclaimer and acknowledgement of limits, indicating thoughtful financial-application behavior.
criteria.reasoning: The submission describes and demonstrates a working financial application: it ingests a user profile, fetches live market data, produces portfolio allocations and explanations, and formats outputs for users. Evidence from Discover and Implement stages shows both intent and concrete implementation; Reflect confirms appropriate financial framing and safeguards, supporting a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "Hello, my name is Don Body and this is my intelligent AI financial advisor tool built entirely using OpenAI's GBT4 and live financial data."
"I'm going to set up secure API keys over here for OpenAI and Alpha Vantage using Python's environment variables"
"And this tool is really useful because it doesn't just give you a number, it gives you a strategy and explains why."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover — articulates user goals and intent for an AI-driven advisor (ties AI to problem context).  
Implement — shows concrete integration steps (secure API keys, Alpha Vantage for live prices, prompt engineering to feed context into GBT4).  
Reflect — acknowledges AI's role and limits (provides strategy, explanations, guardrails), indicating considered use of AI.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates substantive, functional AI integration: a GN/T model (GBT4) is fed engineered prompts plus live market data and returns structured analyses parsed into tables. Implementation details (API keys, Alpha Vantage, parsing AI JSON) and reflective discussion of limitations show more than a superficial use, satisfying the PASS criteria.
